entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
